column2: Et Earello Endorenna utúlien. Sinome maruvan ar hildinyar tenn' Ambar-metta.

column1: '''Realms in Exile''' also known as the '''Kingdoms of the [[Dúnedain]]''' was the collective name for [[Arnor]] and [[Gondor]], the North-Kingdom and South-kingdom of the [[Dúnedain]] in the [[Westlands]] of [[Middle-earth]]. Both Kingdoms were founded in {{SA
column3: SA}}, 3320</ref> by [[High King of the Dúnedain
column4: High King]] [[Elendil]], and his sons who ruled [[Ithilien]] and [[Anórien]].

column1: [[Arnor]] occupied a central part of [[Eriador]] until it vanished during the [[Third Age]] (divided in {{TA
